===========
::English::
===========
Category: Home & Education
Compatibility: Windows XP/Vista/7 (32 and 64 bits).
Language: Spanish (Multilingual).
Instructions Included

Description:
------------
Maple is a powerful and complete application with which you can perform any mathematical operation, however complicated it is, in seconds.
Maple is relatively simple to operate, with an intuitive interface: here you have it the central panel where you perform the operations and the results show, plus a series of floating menus. These will provide access to commands relating to the most complicated operations, as well as a number of symbols and mathematical signs.

So you can calculate from the basic operations (add, subtract, multiply or divide) to more complex as square roots, sines, cosines, logarithms, factorials, prime numbers, derivatives, integrals, limits, powers and functions as well as three thousand. It also includes a powerful utility for displaying graphics in 2D and 3D math.

Features version:
------------------------------
Linearization tools

Built-in tools for linearization of nonlinear algebraic differential equations support the work of control design, calibration and sensitivity analysis.

Solvers for algebraic Riccati equations (CARE / DARE)

New solvers for algebraic Riccati equations, continuous and discrete (CARE and DARE), which allow you to apply advanced techniques to control design problems. These solvers make it easy to design and quickly implement sophisticated controllers, such as those used in robust control theory, optimal models of linear and nonlinear plants.

Control Design

The suite of design tools that provides extended control a greater insight into the dynamic behavior of the system.

MATLAB Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Connectivity

Maple provides expanded connectivity for MATLAB Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, including code translation, code generation, import and export of data files, and calls to MATLAB Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® from Maple.

Improved search capabilities

Improved search capabilities means that the help system searches return more meaningful results faster, so the user can get the information you need fast.

Resolution of more issues in greater depth and breadth of mathematics for engineering applications

Maple 14 provides further mathematical tools to support your engineering applications.

Enhanced performance for faster solutions and handle even larger problems

Performance improvements in Maple 14 increases in speed result in both Maple routines to their own code, so you can find solutions faster and can address larger problems.

New tools and improved resources for the work environment

The added features in Maple 14 improved working environment for interactive exploration, building and construction documentation of programmatic solutions.
